  "code": "import MiniF2F.Minif2fImport
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology
namespace PlayGround
theorem algebra_apbon2pownleqapownpbpowon2(a b : â„)(n : â„•)(hâ‚€ : 0 < a âˆ§ 0 < b)(hâ‚ : 0 < n) :((a + b) / 2)^n â‰¤ (a^n + b^n) / 2 := by

      apply div_pos
      exact add_pos hâ‚€.left hâ‚€.right
      exact zero_lt_two
    calc ((a + b) / 2)^(k + 1) = ((a + b) / 2) * ((a + b) / 2)^k := by rw [pow_succ]
    _ â‰¤ ((a + b) / 2) * ((a^k + b^k) / 2) := by gcongr; exact ih (Nat.succ_pos k)
    _ = (a^(k + 1) + b^(k + 1)) / 2 := by ring"
}
